title: Adaptability
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon will easily adapt to its surroundings, it will travel with ease no matter the terrain.
rule
property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon uses a Damaging Move that matches its Type, add 1 Dice to the Damage pool of that attack.

title: Aerilate
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon never touches the ground, a neverending wind current can be felt swirling around it.
rule
property | Effect | Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokemon uses will deal damage as if they were Flying-Type, affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 Dice of damage to Flying moves.

title: Aftermath
contents: subtitle | When hurt or upset, the Pokemon will prepare to burst. If hit hard enough, it will explode on contact
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon faints due to a Non-Ranged Physical Attack , the user of that attack is dealt 2 Damage.

title: Air Lock
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon surrounds itself in a vacuum. Every Particle of rain, sand, and hail stands floating still around it, and even heat is filtered out of the place.
rule

property | Effect | Negate all the effects of a Weather Condition in the field. If there are no weather conditions in the field, they cannot be activated by Moves or Abilities. If one is already active, it does not disappear but provides no effects.

title: Analytic
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon will never charge recklessly, it will take a moment to think about the best decision to make in any situation.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon has a lower initiative than its target, Add 1 Dice to all of its Damage Pools.

title: Ancient Presence
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | The user's moves becomes typeless and will always hit regardless of abilities.

title: Anger Point
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon will easily get aggressive. Little to no provocation is needed for it to start throwing a tantrum and ripping everything to shreds.
rule
property | Effect | If a foe lands a Critical Hit on this Pokemon, increase 3 Points to its Strength Attribute.

title: Anticipation
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is always alert for threats and rarely sits to relax. If it perceives a potential danger it will get anxious and start shuddering.
rule
property | Effect | If a foe knows a move that would deal Lethal or Super Effective damage against this Pokemon, it will alert its Trainer.

title: Arena Trap
contents: subtitle | The gound around this Pokemon becomes really soft and hard to walk in. When in danger, it will sink the ground around itself creating a shifting sand pit.
rule
property | Effect | Foe Pokemon on the ground become Blocked, they cannot escape or be switched out for as long as this Pokemon is in the field.

title: Aroma Veil
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon lets off a nice smell that helps you to stay relaxed even under stressful situations
rule
property | Effect | User and Allies in range are immune to the effects of the moves: Taunt, Torment Attract, Disable, Encore, and Heal Block.

title: Athenian
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon has a permanent increase of 1 point to its Special attribute.

title: Aura Break
contents: subtitle | Anyone emitting a particularly evil aura will be purified, anyone with an aura of purity will be corrupted by evil by coming close to this Pokemon
rule
property | Effect | Invert the effects that the Abilities Dark Aura and Fairy Aura have on their users. If said Abilities would increase a Dice Pool for their user, reduce it instead.

title: Bad Dreams
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon can transfer its evil intent through the world of dreams, wreaking havoc and bringing fear into the minds of those deep in slumber
rule
property | Effect | At the end of the Round, deal 1 Damage to anyone in the battlefield that has the Sleep Status Condition.

title: Ball Fetch
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is a bit obsessed with playing "Fetch the Ball". It can play for hours and hours and never get bored of it.
rule

property | Effect | Whenever you throw a pokeball to a wild Pokemon, if the roll for catching it is unsuccessful, the pokeball will not break, this Pokemon will bring it back to you at the end of the scene instead.

title: Battery
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's presence creates an electric field that charges up electronics and even makes others feel energized.
rule
property | Effect | Increase 1 point to the Special of all Ally Pokemon in Range. Ally Pokemon get 1 Bonus Dice to all their Special Move's Damage Pool.

title: Battle Armor
contents: subtitle | The skin of the Pokemon is covered by plates of a very resistant material, like rock, steel, or an exoskeleton.
rule
property | Effect | If a Foe lands a Critical Hit on this Pokemon, it will not get any Bonus Dice for it.

title: Battle Bond
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon forges a strong bond with those who face the fiercest battles. After a victory, a surge of power surfaces thanks to their friendship.
rule

property | Effect | AFTER a foe is defeated by this Pokemon, if it has a Loyalty score of 5, change its Form into “Battle-Bond Form” (BBF) until the end of the scene or until it or its Trainer faints. Only one Pokemon per party may have this Ability. Pokemon with this Ability can't hold a Mega-Stone. 
- BBF increases by 2 the Limits of Strength and
 Special of the Pokemon.
- Redistribute Rank points on BBF as you see fit.
- Increase by 1 the Power of a Move of your choice.
- Restore its full HP & Will, and heal any Status
 Ailment upon changing forms.
- When in BBF, all combat damage inflicted on the Pokemon will also be dealt to its Trainer.

title: Beast Boost
contents: subtitle | A wicked satisfaction grows as this creature brings out destruction, for it becomes more savage with every foe that falls to its power.
rule

property | Effect | If a foe faints because of an attack dealt by this Ultra-Beast, Increase 1 Point to its Attribute with highest limit. Up to 3 points can be increased this way. Only Ultra-Beasts might have this Ability. Beast Boost can't be swapped or copied.

title: Berserk
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is usually calm in demeanor, but when its life or someone it cares for is in danger, the adrenaline rush will transform it into an enranged beast.
rule
property | Effect | When this Pokemon's HP is half or less, Increase its Special Attribute by 1.

title: Big Pecks
contents: subtitle | This tenacious Pokemon uses its beak to cover its weak spots.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon cannot have its Defense reduced.

title: Blaze Boost
contents: subtitle |
rule

property | Effect | Immediately before using a Fire type move. Increase the user's Special, Special Defense and Dexterity by 1. Change Emolga to Blaze Boost form. In this form, whenever this Pokemon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, roll 1 Chance Dice to inflict Burn 1 on the foe.

title: Blaze
contents: subtitle | The Fire on this Pokemon's body will burn incredibly fierce just before fading.
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Fire-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

title: Bulletproof
contents: subtitle | The armor on this Pokemon's body protects it from projectiles and small explosions.
rule
property | Effect | Reduce by 1 all damage from Special and Ranged Physical Attacks done to this Pokemon.

title: Cheek Pouch
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is able to store food and objects inside its stretchy cheeks for later consumption.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon restores 2 HP whenever it eats a berry with no HP healing effect. (e.g. Pecha Berry, Lum Berry)

title: Chlorofury
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | When Mega evolving or on switch in. Increase the user's Dexterity by 1 and its Special by X for 2 turns. X is the number of fainted teammates on this Pokemon's team.

title: Chlorophyll
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon synthesizes sunlight to get energy, if it's kept in a sunny environment it will rarely need to eat.
rule
property | Effect | If Sunny Weather is in effect, Increase 2 Points to this Pokemon's Dexterity Attribute.

title: Clear Body
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is completely aware of all its body surroundings, trying to sneak on it will be incredibly difficult.
rule
property | Effect | Other Pokemon cannot Increase or Decrease the Attributes of this Pokemon. This Pokemon can still Increase or Decrease its own Attributes.

title: Cloud Nine
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon will easily feel pleased, and it's prone to be heappier than others. No matter if it's sunny or rainy it will never feel gloomy
rule
property | Effect | Negate the effects of Weather Conditions on this Pokemon. This does not include: Harsh Sunlight, Typhoon and Strong Winds

title: Color Change
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon can change its color and energy to camouflage and merge with the surroundings.
rule
property | Effect | When this Pokemon is dealt damage it will temporarily change its type to match the type of the move that just hit it. The effect ends if the Pokemon is removed from battle.

title: Comatose
contents: subtitle | For some reason this Pokemon is always asleep and can't wake up. Still, it is able to understand commands and move just as if it were sleepwalking
rule

property | Effect | The Pokemon permanently has the “Sleep” Status Condition but it is immune to its effects. This Pokemon can't be inflicted other Status Condition. Moves and Abilities affecting Asleep Pokemon still have an effect on it.

title: Competitive
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's determination grows in the face of adversity. It is always trying to compete with those around it.
rule
property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon gets an Attribute reduced by a foe during a battle, increase 2 Points to its Special.

title: Compound Eyes
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon has peripheral vision that allows it to locate its targets with great precision.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon gets 2 Bonus Dice on the Accuracy Pool of any move with Reduced Accuracy.

title: Contrary
contents: subtitle | Most of the time this pokemon will want to do the opposite of what you want. Sometimes it even contradicts itself.
rule
property | Effect | If anything would Decrease an Attribute of this Pokemon, Increase it instead. If anything would Increase an Attribute of this Pokemon, Decrease it instead.

title: Corrosion
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's venom can eat through metal, wood, and most inorganic and organic materials. Be careful not to touch it.
rule
property | Effect | Ignore any immunity the foe has to Poison-Type Damage and/or to be inflicted Poison and Badly Poisoned Status Ailments.

title: Cotton Down
contents: subtitle | The cotton fluff on this Pokemon's body is constantly being shed, it can be used to make beautiful clothes but it's also bothersome to walk on.
rule
property | Effect | Is Pokemon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, reduce the speed of all Pokemon close to it. (Allies and foes alike at storyteller's discretion)

title: Curious Medicine
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | (provisional) When the Pokemon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

title: Cursed Body
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon carries a curse within itself. Crossing this Pokemon is nota good idea.
rule
property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon is dealt damage with a Move, Roll 3 Chance Dice to disable that move. More than one Move may be disabled this way.

title: Cute Charm
contents: subtitle | It may be its twinkly eyes or its rosy cheeks, but other people and Pokemon will try to win this Pokemon's heart.
rule
property | Effect | If a foe hits this Pokemon with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, roll 3 Chance Dice to make the foe fall in Love

title: Damp
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon gathers the humidity in the air around itself. Lighting a spark or keeping a fire on, will be almost impossible close to it.
rule
property | Effect | No ally or foe will be able to use the moves Explosion or Self-Destruct in an area around this Pokemon.

title: Dancer
contents: subtitle | When someone begins to dance, this Pokemon dances to. It expresses its feelings and communicates through little jigs.
rule

property | Effect | Whenever a Pokemon uses a Move with the word “Dance” (i.e. Dragon Dance, Petal Dance etc.) This Pokemon gets a free action to use the same Move immediately after and succeeds automatically. (Damage must be rolled)

title: Dark Aura
contents: subtitle | A powerful black aura comes out of this Pokemon, Shrouding the field in darkness and filling everyone's hearts with evil, selfishness and corruption.
rule

property | Effect | Increase 2 dice to all Damage Pools of Dark-Type Moves of all Pokemon in the field. This effect does not stack. Pokemon and Trainers on the field will not cooperate with each other.

title: Dauntless Shield
contents: subtitle | The valorous resolve of this Pokemon makes it impervious to physical damage through sheer will. Its presence can be unnerving.
rule
property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon enters battle, Increase 2 Points to its Defense. Outside of battle, this Pokemon is immune to physical damage.

title: Dazzling
contents: subtitle | Its beautiful scales reflect light in a mirror-like manner, no one can help but to stop in their tracks when they glance at this Pokemon.
rule
property | Effect | Foes cannot use Priotity Moves against this Pokemon.

title: Defeatist
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is a pessimist by nature. When things get difficult, it will be the first to give up.
rule

property | Effect | If this Pokemon is at half or less of its total HP, roll this Pokemon's Loyalty every action, if the roll fails Reduce 2 Points to its Strength and Special Attributes for that action. If it's successful it may keep its attributes unchaged.

title: Defiant
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon will not yield, the harder the situation gets, the higher its fighting spirit will grow. It may, however, be a bit of a rebel.
rule
property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon has an Attribute reduced during a battle, Increase 2 Points to its Strength.

title: Delta Stream
contents: subtitle | The wind currents blow through the entire battlefield, Pokemon might be blown away if they don't know how to fly.
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Strong Wind Weather. The effects end when the Pokemon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate, The Pokemon with highest Will might keep the dominant weather)

title: Desolate Land
contents: subtitle | The sun burns so hot your skin gets red and blistered, all water evaporates, and every step of this Pokemon makes the ground become molten lava.
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Harsh Sunlight Weather. The effects end when the Pokemon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate, The Pokemon with highest Will might keep the dominant weather)

title: Disguise
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon wears a convincing disguise of another Pokemon. If it receives damage, the disguise will break, making it appear as if it received a fatal injury.
rule
property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon would receive damage during a battle, reduce that damage to zero. Entry Hazards, Weather Conditions and Status Ailments do not trigger this Ability

title: Download
contents: subtitle |
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes out it will scan its foes and provide information about them. It will then Increase 1 Point to either Strength or Special Attribute at Storyteller's discretion

title: Drizzle
contents: subtitle |
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Rain Weather. The effects end when the Pokemon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate the Pokemon with higher Will might keep the dominant weather)

title: Drought
contents: subtitle | The Sunlight will be harsly bright, and the heat will increase in the field for as long as this Pokemon wants to.
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Sunny Weather. The effects end when the Pokemon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate the Pokemon with higher Will might keep the dominant weather)

title: Dry Skin
contents: subtitle | The skin of this Pokemon will need special care, constant hydration and protection against heat.
rule

property | Effect | If Sunny Weather is in effect, this Pokemon will receive 1 damage at the end of each round. Fire attacks will deal 1 additional Damage to this Pokemon. Water attacks may heal 1 HP to this Pokemon instead of dealing damage.

title: Early Bird
contents: subtitle | Pokemon with this ability are light sleepers that will easily rise from slumber. They wake up full of energy with just a couple hours of sleep.
rule

property | Effect | The time this Pokemon would be asleep is reduced by half, it will only need to score 2 successes on its Insight roll to wake up in battle. This effect does not apply for the move “Rest”

title: Effect Spore
contents: subtitle | When stressed, this Pokemon will leak spores through its body that scatter in the air causing severe allergies.
rule
property | Effect | If hit by a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, the Pokemon rolls 3 Chance Dice to Poison, Paralize or Sleep the foe at random.

title: Electric Surge
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon can surround itself with an electric field that fills the air with tension and keeps everyone on edge.
rule
property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of the Move Electric Terrain. (In case of stalemate the Pokemon with higher Will might keep the dominant Terrain)

title: Emergency Exit
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon makes tactical escapes when the situation escelates out of control. You may force him to fight despite this but it won't like it.
rule

property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon reaches half or less of its HP, it will switch out to its pokeball, sending an Ally to take its place. If there is no Ally, the battle may end. This Ability's effect is not affected by Block.

title: Ethereal Shroud
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | The user gains Ghost type associated immunities and resistances.

title: Fairy Aura
contents: subtitle | A powerful pink glowing aura comes out of this Pokemon, covering the field in a glimmering light, filling everyone's hearts with peace, hope, and love.
rule

property | Effect | Increase 2 dice to all Damage Pools of Fairy-Type Moves of all Pokemon in the field. This effect does not stack. Pokemon and Trainers on the field will not attack the user of this Ability.

title: Filter
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon uses an invisible energy field to filter away harmful energies and substances.
rule
property | Effect | If a foe uses a move that would deal Super Effective Damage to this Pokemon, reduce by 1 the total Damage from that attack.

title: Flame Body
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon can willingly ignite its body on fire, receiving no harm from it. Objects that come into contact with this Pokemon may catch fire.
rule
property | Effect | When hit by a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, this Pokemon rolls 3 Chance Dice to burn the foe.

title: Flare Boost
contents: subtitle | Pokemon with this ability benefit from the extreme heat produced by fire. It might be somewhat of a pyromaniac.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon gets any Burn condition, Increase 2 points to its Special attribute.

title: Flash Fire
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is capable of consuming other fire sources and adding them to its own. Walking through embers, fire, lava and hell feel like a breeze to it.
rule

property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon is hit by a Fire-Type move, add 1 Extra Die to the Damage Pool of Fire-type Moves this Pokemon uses until the end of the scene. Fire-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokemon.

title: Flower Gift
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's petals radiate full of energy when the sun shines bright. The energy irradiated makes those around feel stronger.
rule
property | Effect | If Sunny weather is in effect, Increase 2 Points to the Strength and Sp.Defense Attribute of the user and its allies

title: Flower Veil
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon makes flowers grow in gardens and near other Pokemon to protect them from harm.
rule

property | Effect | User and allies can't have their Attributes reduced. User and allies can't have any Status Condition inflicted on them. Previously inflicted Attribute reductions and/or ailments remain.

title: Fluffy
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's fur is so fluffy you could die. So soft and Snuggly that it invites you to hug it. Tumble dry with no heat, do not iron.
rule
property | Effect | Reduce by 2 the Damage dealt to this Pokemon by All Physical Attacks. Incread by 2 the Damage dealt to this Pokemon by Fire-Type Attacks.

title: Forecast
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon can absorb the elements around to adapt and survive even under extreme conditions.
rule
property | Effect | The Type of this Pokemon will change depending on the active weather. Fire under Sun, Water under Rain, Ice under Hail and Rock under Sand.

title: Forewarn
contents: subtitle | When this Pokemon feels bad intentions or disaster approaching, it will mentally warn its trainer. The trainer must make a roll of Insight to get the message.
rule
property | Effect | In battle, this Pokemon will warn about the strongest move one of its foes has. Storyteller has to reveal it to the trainer of this Pokemon in secret.

title: Foundry
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | Rock-Type Attacks that the Pokemon uses will deal damage as if they were Fire-Type, affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 Dice of damage to Fire moves.

title: Friend Guard
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is adorable and wakes the parental instincts in others. All of its allies will seek to potect it all the time.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon is hit by a move performed by an ally, Reduce by 2 the damage dealt to it.

title: Frisk
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon can see the items others may be carrying, even if they are hidden.
rule
property | Effect | When this Pokemon enters the battlefield, Storyteller must reveal its trainer the held item of one foe.

title: Full Metal Body
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's body is a think metal armor, its shiny coat cannot be muddled. Look inside of it and you may be blinded by the sun's brightness.
rule
property | Effect | Other Pokemon cannot Decrease the Attributes of this Pokemon. This Pokemon can still Decrease its own Attributes.

title: Fur Coat
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's fluffy exterior is cuddly, soft, hypoallergenic, and also serves as a cushin against powerful blows.
rule
property | Effect | Reduce by 2 the Damage dealt to this Pokemon by All Physical Attacks.

title: Gale Wings
contents: subtitle | This pokemon's wings are perfectly designed to ride the roughest winds effortlessly.
rule
property | Effect | Add +1 Priority to all Flying-Type Moves of this Pokemon.

title: Galvanize
contents: subtitle | The body of this Pokemon is surrounded by electrical currents, this makes it very energized in everything it does.
rule
property | Effect | Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokemon uses will deal damage as if they were Electric-Type, affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 Extra Die of Damage to Electric Moves.

title: Gluttony
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon eats all day long, it has no problem to find food sources since it's not a picky eater at all.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon can eat any type of food, medicine or herbal medicine with no negative. This pokemon can eat any held berries at any point of the battle as a free action.

title: Gooey
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's sticky ooze will rub into anyone that touches it. This may become quite a burden. On the bright side, it is a natural and organic glue.
rule
property | Effect | The first time an opponent hits this Pokemon with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, reduce 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute.

title: Gorilla Tactics
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon's manners leave a lot to be desired, it is brutish and uncivilized, its only approach to facing problems
rule

property | Effect | At the start of the fight, choose a Move. Increase 1 point to this Pokemon's Strength Attribute, it can only perform the chosen Move but it may Evade every Round. This effect resets if the Pokemon is recalled from battle.

title: Grass Pelt
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon has a lush coat of grass to protect its body, even if you cut it, it will regrow in a few days.
rule
property | Effect | If the effects of the move Grassy Terrain are active, Increase 2 Points to this Pokemon's Defense Attribute.

title: Grassy Surge
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon can surround itself with a grass field that makes it easy to relax and laze around in the sun.
rule
property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of the Move Grassy Terrain. (In case of stalemate the Pokemon with higher Will might keep the dominant Terrain)

title: Gulp Missile
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is an excellent hunter, when diving into a pool of water it will always come out with prey. And it will sometimes use the prey as a weapon.
rule

property | Effect | If this Pokemon uses the Moves Surf or Dive, it will change forms after dealing damage. “Gulping Form” if it has more than half HP remaining, “Gorging Form” if it has half or less HP remaining. If the Pokemon is dealt damage by a foe when it is in any of this Forms, deal 2 Dice of Damage and an effect to it. Return this Pokemon to its regular form afterwards.

title: Guts
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon dares to do everything no one else dares to, and won't lose its determination easily. It may be a little reckless, though.
rule
property | Effect | While affected by a Status Condition, Increase 2 Points to this Pokemon's Strength Attribute.

title: Harvest
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon will naturally produce edible fruits in a short period of time, if fed with berries it will start growing them too.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon uses a berry as a held item during a fight, the berry will grow back at the end of the day.

title: Healer
contents: subtitle | The pokemon has healing powers, and will use them without hesitation to aid others.
rule
property | Effect | If an Ally on the battlefield has a Status Ailment, at the End of the Round this Pokemon rolls 3 Chance Dice to heal it.

title: Heatproof
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon can resist very high temperatures without trouble.
rule
property | Effect | Burn 1 deals no Damage to this Pokemon. If this Pokemon is hit by a Fire-Type Attack, Reduce the damage dealt by 2.

title: Heavy Metal
contents: subtitle | The metal covering the body of the Pokemon is so thick it easily doubles the normal weight of the Pokemon.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon weighs twice as much as it's supposed to. Moves with damage based on weight get their damage pool modified accordingly.

title: Heliophobia
contents: subtitle |
rule

property | Effect | If Sunny Weather is in effect, this Pokemon will receive 1 damage at the end of each round. If New Moon is in effect, you may restore 1 HP to this Pokemon at the end of each Round.

title: Honey Gather
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon produces its own honey, you can get a small barrel of high quality honey every day.
rule

property | Effect | The Pokemon produces its own honey, you can get a small barrel of high quality honey every day. A small barrel of honey can be sold for up to $100. Honey attracts wild Pokemon and feeding a Pokemon with it will make it happy.

title: Hubris
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | If a foe faints because of an attack dealt by this Pokemon, Increase 1 Point to its Special Attribute. Up to 3 points can be increased this way.

title: Huge Power
contents: subtitle | The pokemon has an unnatural source of strength beyond its physical appearance.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon has a permanent increase of 1 point to its Strength attribute.

title: Hunger Switch
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon becomes really upset if it gets hungry, it will bite and act out unless you constantly give it snacks.
rule
property | Effect | At the End of the Round, switch this Pokemon's form. Only Morpeko may have this ability. This ability cannot be copied or switched.

title: Hustle
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon will perform everything in a hurry, usually being kind of sloppy.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon gets an extra -1 Reduced Accuracy and 2 Extra Dice to the Damage pool for all its Physical Attacks.

title: Hydration
contents: subtitle | The body of the Pokemon absorbs water and uses its moisture to maintain a healthy state.
rule
property | Effect | When Rain weather is in effect, this Pokemon will cure any status ailment it has at the end of the round.

title: Hyper Cutter
contents: subtitle | The claws of this Pokemon are very sharp and can't be dulled.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon cannot have its Strength Attribute reduced by any means.

title: Ice Body
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon's body is almost frozen, it feels at home when temperatures are below zero
rule
property | Effect | If Hail Weather is in effect you may restore 1 HP to this Pokemon at the end of the round. This Pokemon is immune to damage from Hail weather.

title: Ice Cleats
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | If Hail Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Dexterity Attibute of this Pokemon.

title: Ice Face
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's face is covered by a thick block of ice that serves as a cover of its body. If it breaks it will need a very cold temperature to form it again.
rule

property | Effect | The Pokemon has 2 extra HP when it is on “Ice Face form”. If the Ice receives 2 damage, change the Pokemon's form to “No-Ice Form”. To restore “Ice Face Form” the Pokemon must be out one whole Round while Hail weather is active.

title: Ice Scales
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's body is covered by crystal scales made of ice. Always cold to the touch, it easily deflects most projectiles, energy and light on its surface.
rule
property | Effect | Reduce by 2 the Damage dealt to this Pokemon by All Special Attacks.

title: Illuminate
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon naturally produces light through its body. Other Pokemon approach curiously when they see this light.
rule

property | Effect | Increases the chance of random Wild Pokemon encounters. If there were enviromental challenges where there is reduced visibility, this Pokemon and it's allies are immune to the effects.

title: Illusion
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon casts an illusion on itself to look like another creature it has seen. The illusion is indistinguishable from the real one.
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes out, it will have the form of another Pokemon in the party, it will regain its original form if it receives damage. When taking a human form it cannot speak and its tail may remain visible.

title: Immunity
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon has a very strong immune system and will rarely get sick. It could even eat rotten food without getting sick.
rule
property | Effect | Poison and Badly Poisoned Status deal no damage to this Pokemon.

title: Imposter
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon can alter its own cell structure extremely fast to transform into a copy of another being.
rule
property | Effect | As soon as it enters to battle, this Pokemon will be under the effects of the move Transform.

title: Infiltrator
contents: subtitle | The Pokemonis very stealthy with it's movements, it is naturally harder to detect than others.
rule
property | Effect | Shield Moves, Safeguard, Substitute, Light Screen, and Reflect are ignored by this Pokemon.

title: Innards Out
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | If an attack would faint this Pokemon, it inflicts damage on the foe equal to whatever remaining HP it had.

title: Inner Focus
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is extrmely serious and focused on everything it does. It remains calm and never backs down, even if it's getting severly injured.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon does not Flinch and cannot be Intimidated. (Intimidate Ability does not have any effect against this Pokemon.)

title: Insomnia
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon does not need to sleep, it will be awake no matter the hour.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon is not affected by the Sleep Status.

title: Intimidate
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon has an overwhelming presence that inspires both fear and respect from others.
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes into battle, Reduce 1 Point to the Strength of all foes in range. This effect will last for as long as this Pokemon is out. Reduce random encounters with wild Pokemon.

title: Intoxicate
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokemon uses will deal damage as if they were Poison-Type. Affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 extra Die of Damage to Poison Moves.

title: Intrepid Sword
contents: subtitle | This audacious Pokemon is fearless to any challenge, its strength increases through sheer will. Its presence can be very menacing.
rule
property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon enters battle, Increase 2 Points to its Strength. Outside of battle, this Pokemon can cut through any surface.

title: Iron Barbs
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is covered with sharp steel quils that hurt anyone who may touch them carelessly
rule
property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon is hit with a Non- Ranged Physical Attack, Roll 1 Die of Damage against the attacker.

title: Iron Fist
contents: subtitle | The hands of this pokemon are very strong and heavy, when curled into fists they can go through anything.
rule
property | Effect | Add 1 Dice to the Damage Pool of Fist Based moves.

title: Irrelephant
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | Moves performed by this Pokemon ignores type based immunity.

title: Justified
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon has an innate sense of justice, wrongdoings will make them really angry.
rule
property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon is hit by a Dark-Type Attack or if it has witnessed something it considers unjust, Increase 1 Point to its Strength Attribute.

title: Keen Eye
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon has an exceptional sight, locating small or far away objects will be a lot easier.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon cannot have successes removed from its Accuracy rolls by Moves, Items or Abilities. Pain Penalizations and Difficulty Penalties may still apply.

title: Klutz
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon does not understand how to use tools correctly, usually using them in unexpected ways.
rule
property | Effect | Held items won't have any effect on this Pokemon.

title: Leaf Guard
contents: subtitle | The leaves on this Pokemon expand with the sun to cover its body.
rule
property | Effect | If Sunny weather is in effect, this Pokemon can't have any Status Conditions inflicted. Previously inflicted conditions remain.

title: Lernean
contents: subtitle |
rule

property | Effect | The Pokemon gains additional heads when it loses hp. One at 80%, 60%, 40% and 20%. Each head adds an additional 1 damage die to the Pokemon. Restoring HP does not remove the heads and they will only disappeaar when the user cancels the Mega Evolution.

title: Levitate
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon floats to move around without touching the ground.
rule
property | Effect | Ground-Type moves and effects on the ground won't affect this Pokemon. If a Pokemon uses a move that binds it to the ground the effects are lost until it is free again.

title: Libero
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon always has its mind in the game. It will favor a defensive position and make the best special passes when it finally attacks.
rule
property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon uses a move, first change its type to that of the move. If the move is an attack and deals damage, use the appropriate STAB.

title: Light Metal
contents: subtitle | The material covering its body will be light as a feather, causing this Pokemon to weigh from 50% to 75% less than it is supposed to.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon weighs 50% less than it's supposed to. Moves with damage based on weight get their damage pool modified accordingly.

title: Lightning Rod
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon will attract lightning and electricity to itself to charge its power.
rule

property | Effect | If anyone uses an Electric-Type move with a Single target, it will be redirected to this Pokemon; it is immune to damage from them. The first time this Pokemon is hit by an Electric-Type move, Increase 1 Point to this Pokemon's Special.

title: Limber
contents: subtitle | The muscles of this Pokemon are incredibly flexible and elastic. Easing their movement, agility, and grace.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon is not affected by the Paralysis Status.

title: Liquid Ooze
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon produces a pestilent and toxic ooze within its body. Do not attempt to eat it.
rule
property | Effect | If hit by a move that would asborb this Pokemon's vital energy (Leech seed, Dream Eater, Drain Punch, etc.) it will instead deal that amount as damage.

title: Liquid Voice
contents: subtitle | Sound waves from its voice turn the moisture in the air into water, seemingly conjuring dew, rain, and even cascades out of nothing.
rule
property | Effect | All Sound-Based Moves this Pokemon uses are considered Water-Type.

title: Long Reach
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is able to attack through the shadows of objects and foes meanwhile the real targets suffer the damage.
rule
property | Effect | All Attacks made by this Pokemon are considered Ranged attacks.

title: Magic Bounce
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon will use psychic control on its foe to make it indirectly harm itself, making it look like magic.
rule
property | Effect | All Support moves that target this Pokemon or its side of the battlefield will have its effects redirected into the foe's instead.

title: Magic Guard
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is covered by a faint energy that stops any minor harm that may come its way.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon won't receive damage from Status Conditions, Recoil, Held Item or Weather Conditions

title: Magician
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon excells at performing simple magic tricks that amaze others, such as conjuring and vanishing objects nearby in the blink of an eye.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon will steal the Held Item of a foe it just hit.

title: Magma Armor
contents: subtitle | The body of the Pokemon is always hot to the touch, it can heat a large room just by standing inside and can also endure high temperatures.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon is not affected by the Frozen Status.

title: Magnet Pull
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon can activate a magnetic field around itself to attract all kinds of metals.
rule
property | Effect | All Steel-Type Pokemon on the field are Blocked.

title: Marvel Scale
contents: subtitle | The beautiful scales of this Pokemon will harden when its body is under stress.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon has a Status Ailment, Increase 2 points to its Defense Attribute.

title: Mega Launcher
contents: subtitle | The cannons on this Pokemon's body allow it to fire extremely powerful attacks.
rule
property | Effect | Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage pool/Healing Pool of moves with the keyword “Pulse” and “Aura” on their name.

title: Merciless
contents: subtitle | Once this Pokemon senses weakness, it begins acting according to their brutal nature. They can be cruel if not put in their place.
rule

property | Effect | If the Foe is inflicted with Poison or Badly Poison, all of this Pokemon Moves are considered to be Critical Hits. This Pokemon will not hold back when using Lethal Damage Moves at Storyteller's discretion.

title: Mimicry
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's body is perfect for camouflaging in the ground. It can sometimes get lost but you will find it if some unfortunate victim steps on it.
rule

property | Effect | If there is a Terrain Move active (i.e. Electric Terrain, Psyichic Terrain etc.) Change this Pokemon's main type to match the active Terrain. Restore its original main type if the terrain effects end.

title: Minus
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon has a natural Negative charge. It will attract Positive charge and repel other negative charge. They are prone to feel blue.
rule
property | Effect | If an ally Pokemon on the field has the ability “Plus”, Increase 2 Points to the Special Attribute of this Pokemon.

title: Mirror Armor
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon's body is covered with a shiny armor. Said armor will repel and bounce back anything intending to weaken it.
rule
property | Effect | All Attribute-reducing effects that target this Pokemon or its side of the battlefield will have its effects redirected into the foe's instead.

title: Misty Surge
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon can surround itself with a misty field that is eerily quiet, it feels peaceful and soothing but also lonesome and isolated.
rule
property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of the Move Misty Terrain. (In case of stalemate the Pokemon with higher Will might keep the dominant Terrain)

title: Mold Breaker
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon will find unusual ways to achieve its goals. They are inventive and go around problems.
rule
property | Effect | If a foe Pokemon has a type, an immunity, or an Ability that would prevent this Pokemon from attacking with a certain Move, ignore it.

title: Moody
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon will have some severe mood swings, and be temperamental most of the time. Hopefully it's just a phase.
rule
property | Effect | At the end of each round, reset Attributes modified by Moody, then Reduce 1 Point to a random Attribute and Increase 1 Point to another random Attribute.

title: Motor Drive
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon absorbs electricity and stores it as energy to run faster.
rule
property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon is hit by an Electric-type move, Increase 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute. This Pokemon doesn't receive damage from Electrictype moves.

title: Moxie
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is naturally fierce and will try to get to a position of power by defeating the alphas in the pack.
rule
property | Effect | If a foe faints because of an attack dealt by this Pokemon, Increase 1 Point to its Strength Attribute. Up to 3 points can be increased this way.

title: Multiscale
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is covered by two layers of hard scales, if one layer is damaged it will be shed and regrown later.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon was at full health, Reduce by 1 the damage dealt by an attack.

title: Multitype
contents: subtitle | All the energies that created the universe flow raw through this Pokemon's body and it harnesses whichever is more convenient at the moment.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon can freely change its Type at any moment. This Ability can't be copied, switched, changed, ignored, or negated in any way.

title: Mummy
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon will curse whoever dares to inflict harm upon them, the curse may even last for generations and will need the aid of a medium to lift it.
rule
property | Effect | When this Pokemon hits or gets hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, the foe's ability is changed to Mummy.

title: Natural Cure
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's body will generate substances to heal itself. They can be used to create medicine.
rule
property | Effect | At the end of the round, if this Pokemon has a Status Ailment, it Rolls 3 Chance Dice to heal itself.

title: Neuroforce
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's psychic power is overwhelming and can be felt even by simply standing nearby. It will exploit any weakness it finds in your mind.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon will deal 1 automatic Damage on any Move that is Super Effective against a foe.

title: Neutralizing Gas
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is surrounded by a sweet-smelling but noxious gas. Most poeple and Pokemon can't help but to stop and smell it, though.
rule
property | Effect | Foe Pokemon in range will have their Abilities effects negated as long as this Pokemon is out.

title: No Guard
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon can focus on attacking perfectly but will be open to the attacks of its foes as it won't focus on anything but its precision.
rule
property | Effect | You can declare you won't make any Evasion Action at the start of the Round. If you do, roll all moves of this Pokemon as if they had no reduced accuracy.

title: Normalize
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon's actions are never impressive, always dull and never seem to accomplish anything exceptional.
rule
property | Effect | All the moves known by this Pokemon are considered Normal Type. Affecting STAB, weaknesses, immunities, and resistances. Add 1 Dice of Damage to all Normal Moves.

title: Oblivious
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon will rarely have a satisfactory social interaction. It'll be too self-absorbed to take the hints of what is expected from it.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon is not affected by the Love Status. It is immune to the effects of moves that affect its feelings such as Taunt, Charm, Captivate etc.

title: Omnitype
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | The user is considered all types when defending.

title: Overcoat
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon will have a protective coat surrounding its body that allows it to live under extreme weather conditions.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon won't be damaged by weather conditions.

title: Overgrow
contents: subtitle | When this Pokemon is hurt, it will grow huge plants in its body to defend itself, these plants are very strong but wither quickly.
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Grass-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

title: Own Tempo
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon will do everything at its own pace, peer pressure will be ignored. Its behavior reflexive and calm... maybe too calm.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon is not affected by the Confused Status.

title: Parental Bond
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon and its youngling are really close to each other, they do everything together. The parent is very protective.
rule
property | Effect | All of the Damage Pools of this Pokemon get rolled twice. Choose the highest roll to deal damage to the foe.

title: Pastel Veil
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is surrounded by a soft-colored glimmer this energy feels pure and full of innocence. Unattainable and otherworldly.
rule
property | Effect | User and Allies in range are immune to Poison and Badly Poison. If the condition was inflicted before this Pokemon came out, it will remain.

title: Pendulum
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | Increases the damage pool of moves by 1 when used consecutively up to 3 times.

title: Periodic Orbit
contents: subtitle |
rule

property | Effect | Moves like Future Sight, Doom Desire and Wish will now activate twice. For example, Future Sight and Doom Desire will now activate once on the 2nd turn and then trigger again on the 4th turn. Wish will activate on the next round and a 2nd time on the 2nd round.

title: Perish Body
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon slently curses those who cross it. Condemning their souls to suffer as it has suffered. Avoid this Pokemon, lest you suffer its grudge.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon is hit with Non-Ranged Physical Attack, the Foe will receive its remaining HP as damage and faint after three Rounds, unless it is removed from battle.

title: Phototroph
contents: subtitle |
rule

property | Effect | If Sunny weather is in effect, you may restore 1 HP to this Pokemon at the end of each Round. You can still restore 1 HP at the end of each round without Sunny weather but only 5 per day. This ability is disabled during New Moon and Rainy weather.

title: Pickpocket
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon will instinctively steal from others. It takes whatever it can when people are not looking.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon is not holding an Item it will steal the held Item of the foe it just hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack.

title: Pickup
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon will often gather objects and keep a small hoard of treasure it may share with you.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon was out of its Pokeball, at the end of the scene see what it found for you at Storyteller's discretion.

title: Pixilate
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon scatters fairy dust that brings happy thoughts to the mind. Everything it does is incredibly adorable.
rule
property | Effect | Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokemon uses will deal damage as if they were Fairy-Type. Affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 extra Die of Damage to Fairy Moves.

title: Plus
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon has a natural Positive charge. It will attract negative charge and repel other positive charge. It has a red blush all the time.
rule
property | Effect | If an ally Pokemon has the ability “Minus”, Increase 2 Points to the Special Attribute of this Pokemon.

title: Poison Heal
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon has an immunity to any poison and also assimilates that venom as an energy source.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon becomes poisoned or badly poisoned. It will Heal 1 HP at the end of each round instead of receiving damage. The Poison will be completely absorbed after 3 Rounds.

title: Poison Point
contents: subtitle | The point thorns and scales on this Pokemon releases poison that will infect anyone who touches them roughly. Wear gloves when handling them.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon is hit by a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the foe.

title: Poison Touch
contents: subtitle | Venomous substances will ooze through the body of this Pokemon, you'll become very sick if it touches you.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon hits its foe with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, Roll 2 Chance Dice to Poison the foe.

title: Power Construct
contents: subtitle | Small cells gather around this Pokemon and are absorbed into its body. It grows bigger and stronger as more cells come together.
rule

property | Effect | At the end of the Round, if this Pokemon has half or less of its HP, change its Form to the next one. When this Pokemon changes Form, remove Status Ailments & restore its full HP & Will. This Ability can't be copied, switched, or changed.

title: Power Spot
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon releases mysterious energy that messes up with electronics and compasses but can somehow make you feel very energized.
rule
property | Effect | Increase 1 Extra Die to the Damage Pools from Moves of One Ally. This Effect does not stack on the same Ally if multiple Pokemon use this Ability.

title: Power of Alchemy
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon can absorb the essence of everything it touches, fusing with the chemical composition and even the genes of discarded trash.
rule

property | Effect | For the next 24 Hours the Pokemon copies the ability of a fainted foe. Multiple Abilities may be copied this way, but only one may be active during combat. (Certain Abilities cannot be copied at Storyteller's Discretion)

title: Prankster
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon will always have a mischievous twinkle in its eyes, no one around will be safe from its pranks.
rule
property | Effect | Add Pritority +1 to all Support moves of this Pokemon.

title: Pressure
contents: subtitle | Being around this Pokemon will be very stressing and demanding, even the bravest will feel themselves faltering.
rule
property | Effect | While this Pokemon is out, reduce the total Will Points of all foes by half, rounded down.

title: Primordial Sea
contents: subtitle | The torrential rain barely lets you breathe, the field quickly becomes flooded and you must swim to stay afloat. No fire can be ignited at a time like this.
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Typhoon Weather. The effects end when the Pokemon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate, The Pokemon with highest Will might keep the dominant weather)

title: Prism Armor
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's body is an incredibly resilient armor. It manages to withstand even hits that should shatter it to pieces.
rule
property | Effect | Negate all automatic Damage from any Super Effective Move dealt to this Pokemon.

title: Prism Guard
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon is hit with a non-contact Attack, Roll 1 Die of damage against the attacker.

title: Propeller Tail
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon's tail allows it to maneuver very easily while in the water. It has no problem making sudden sharp turns to persue and catch its prey.
rule
property | Effect | Ignore any Moves or Abilities that would redirect this Pokemon's Moves into another target. (i.e. The Move “Follow Me”, the Ability “Lightining Rod” etc.)

title: Protean Maxima
contents: subtitle |
rule

property | Effect | Whenever Eevee uses a move that corresponds with its evolution. Switch its form to said Eeveelution. Eevee gains the type, stats as well as the abilities of said Eeveelution in addition to Protean Maxima.

title: Protean
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's versitile body gives it profeciency on practically everything it sets out to do.
rule
property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon uses a move, first change its type to that of the move. If the move is an attack and deals damage, use the appropriate STAB.

title: Psychic Surge
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon can surround itself with a psychic field that makes everyone pause, hearing things that are not there.
rule
property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of the Move Psychic Terrain. (In case of stalemate the Pokemon with higher Will might keep the dominant Terrain)

title: Psycho Call
contents: subtitle |
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Psychic-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

title: Punk Rock
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon loves music and loud noises. It is constantly jamming with its air guitar and can easily improvise a music number out of nothing.
rule
property | Effect | Sound-Based Moves this Pokemon uses have 1 Extra Die to their Damage Pool. Sound-Based Moves deal 2 less Damage to this Pokemon.

title: Pure Power
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon makes use of its psychic powers to move objects several times bigger.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon has a permanent increase of 1 point to its Strength attribute.

title: Queenly Majesty
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's presence commands awe and respect. Others have no choice but to do as it says, whoever tries to outplay it, will feel its discontent
rule
property | Effect | Foes cannot use Priotity Moves against this Pokemon.

title: Quick Draw
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | (provisional) Enables the Pokemon to move first occasionally. (1 Chance Die)

title: Quick Feet
contents: subtitle | Most of the time this Pokemon will seem to be in a hurry. When Pressured it will move faster than normal.
rule

property | Effect | While affected by any Status Condition, Increase 2 Points to this Pokemon's Dexterity Attribute. The Pokemon may be inflicted with Paralysis condition but this Ability prevents its effects.

title: RKS System
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon's physiology morphs according to the data disc inserted in its RKS-drive. There are 17 discs, one for each Type. (No disc is Normal Type).
rule
property | Effect | Change the Pokemon's Type to match the Disc on its Held Item slot. (i.e. Electric Disc makes this Pokemon become an Electric Type)

title: Rain Dish
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon will store rain water for drink and nourishment.
rule
property | Effect | If Rain weather is in effect, you may restore 1 HP to this Pokemon at the end of each Round.

title: Rattled
contents: subtitle | When this scaredy Pokemon becomes startled or scared it will make haste to get away from danger.
rule
property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon is hit by a Bug, Dark, or Ghost-Type Attack, increase 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute.

title: Receiver
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is used to learning the tactic behavior of other Pokemon with which they have a bond.
rule

property | Effect | If an Ally is fainted in battle, this Pokemon may copy their ability for the next 24 hours. Only one Ability may be copied this way. (Certain Abilities cannot be copied at Storyteller's Discretion)

title: Reckless
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon will often get into risky situations in order to get what it wants. They are prone to risk their lives without thinking of the consequences.
rule
property | Effect | When this Pokemon performs a move with Recoil, Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of that move.

title: Refrigerate
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's body works akin to a freezer, it can freeze things just by touching them.
rule
property | Effect | Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokemon uses will deal damage as if they were Ice-Type. Affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 Die of Damage to Ice moves.

title: Regenerator
contents: subtitle | The body of this Pokemon will regenerate from damage really quick, wounds that would take days to heal will get better in a few hours.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon may Heal up to 4 Damage or up to 2 Lethal Damage on its own every day. The Pokemon must be out of combat to benefit from this effect.

title: Regurgitation
contents: subtitle |
rule

property | Effect | When Sand Tomb is active, everytime Delta Muk attacks, it will perform a second attack that has 2 damage rolls.. The typing is based on the primary type of the Pokemon caught in the Sand Tomb

title: Ripen
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon can Riped fruits and berries in no time to make them extra sweet and delicious, healing berries will have their effects boosted.
rule

property | Effect | Moves that use berries for added effects will have 2 Extra Dice on their Damage Pool (i.e. “Natural Gift” etc.) Increase the Healing properties of Berries at Storyteller's discretion.

title: Rivalry
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon will be very competitive with others to prove its position as the alpha of the group, however, it will try to gain the favor of possible mates.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon has a foe of the same gender, Increase 1 Point to its Strength Attribute. If the foe is the opposite gender, Reduce 1 Point to its Strength Attribute.

title: Rock Head
contents: subtitle | The head and body of the Pokemon are so resistant that they barely feel anything. Careful as they bump into things without even noticing.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon will not receive damage from Recoil.

title: Rough Skin
contents: subtitle | Use Protection on your hands when touching this Pokemon. Its body is covered by sharp scales or barbs that get hooked into the skin.
rule
property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, Roll 1 Die of damage against the attacker.

title: Run Away
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is a master of escape. It will be difficult to catch and can even squeeze through the tiniest gaps to get away.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon cannot be Blocked. It may also obtain bonus dice to escape from battle or captivity at Storyteller's discretion.

title: Sand Force
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon controls the particles of sand around the battlefield to give boosts to its attacks.
rule

property | Effect | If Sandstorm Weather is in effect when this Pokemon deals damage using Ground, Steel or Rock-Type attacks, add 1 Extra Die to the damage pool of that attack. The Pokemon is immune to damage from Sandstorm Weather.

title: Sand Rush
contents: subtitle | While sand whips across the battlefield, the Pokemon can paddle through it as if it was water.
rule
property | Effect | If Sandstorm Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Dexterity Attibute of this Pokemon. The Pokemon is immune to damage from Sandstorm Weather.

title: Sand Spit
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon slithers through the desert sand, eating some of it in the process, if it gets hot (or sneezes) a sandstorm will blow up.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical attack, it starts the effects of Sandstorm Weather. The effect lasts 4 rounds.

title: Sand Stream
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon can activate a raging sandstorm around itself that will last for as long as it wants.
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Sandstorm Weather. The effects end when the Pokemon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate the Pokemon with higher Will, might keep the dominant weather)

title: Sand Veil
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon's body is easily concealed by sand particles in the air.
rule
property | Effect | If Sandstorm Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Evasion of this Pokemon. The Pokemon is immune to damage from Sandstorm weather.

title: Sap Sipper
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's diet consists strickly of plants, it is particularly fond of sweet sap for nourishment.
rule

property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon is hit by a Grass-type attack, Increase 1 Point to its Strength Attribute instead of dealing damage. Grass-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokemon.

title: Schooling
contents: subtitle | When this Pokemon is threatened, it calls thousands of allies to create an uncontrollable monster. The closer to the sea, the faster they arrive.
rule

property | Effect | Only Wishiwashi can use this Ability. When this Pokemon reaches half or less of its HP its allies will arrive, when they do, replace your Pokemon for Wishiwashi School-Form at full HP. Increase its Rank to Pro. At the end of the battle restore Wishiwashi to its base form. (Healing/Fainting/Recalling prevents allies from arriving)

title: Scrappy
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon does not believe in ghosts.
rule

property | Effect | This Pokemon has the ability to hit Ghost-type Pokemon with Normal-type and Fighting-type moves, dealing Regular Damage. Apply the right resistances or weaknesses to the foe if it has a secondary type.

title: Screen Cleaner
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is constantly cleaning an invisible screen, it cleans them so well that even real glass screens can disappear after it is done with them.
rule
property | Effect | When this Pokemon enters the field, remove any barries (i.e.Light Screen, Reflect etc.) on both the user and the foe's side of the field.

title: Serene Grace
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon will bring good luck as if it was blessed by the heavens. Its presence is soothing, it makes you feel calm and full of joy.
rule
property | Effect | Add 2 Extra Chance Dice to all effects done by this Pokemon. (e.g. A move has 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe, will roll 5 Dice with this Pokemon)

title: Shadow Call
contents: subtitle |
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Dark-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

title: Shadow Dance
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | If New Moon is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Dexterity Attibute of this Pokemon.

title: Shadow Shield
contents: subtitle | When it is at full strength, this Pokemon's ghostly body cannot be touched or pierced by anything, it can even go through walls as if they weren't there.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon was at full health, Reduce by 2 the damage dealt by an attack. This effect cannot be ignored by Moves or Abilities.

title: Shadow Tag
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon steps on the opponent's shadow, preventing them from moving too far.
rule
property | Effect | All foes become Blocked. Ghost-type Pokemon are immune to this effect. Pokemon with the same ability are immune to this effect.

title: Shed Skin
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is constantly growing skin anew and molting the old one when it becomes too damaged.
rule
property | Effect | At the end of the round. If this Pokemon has a Status Condition, it rolls 3 Chance Dice to heal itself.

title: Sheer Force
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is only interested in showing off its incredible battle prowess.
rule
property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon uses an attack with chance dice for an additional effect, you may ignore those chance dice and add 2 Dice to its damage pool.

title: Shell Armor
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's shell protects its vulnerable spots from its opponents.
rule
property | Effect | If a foe lands a Critical Hit on this Pokemon, it will not get its Bonus Damage Dice for that attack.

title: Shield Dust
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon constantly generates specs of dust to shield and protect itself.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon is hit by an attack with chance dice for an additional effect, it won't be affected by said effects.

title: Shields Down
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon's core is protected by a sturdy shield, if the shield is shattered the Pokemon starts acting crazy.
rule

property | Effect | Only Minior can use this Ability. After reaching half or less of its HP in battle, replace Minior by Minior (Core) at full HP. To restore it to its base form, the core must be set free and then recaptured after it returns a few days later.

title: Simple
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's ingenious mind is easily swayed by not only its own, but also outside influences. It often finds ways to simplify things.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon gets an Attribute reduced, reduce 1 more Point. If this Pokemon gets an Attribute increased, increase 1 more Point.

title: Skill Link
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon can proficiently chain a flurry of attacks. It also enjoys repitition and sequences.
rule
property | Effect | Add 2 Dice to the Accuracy roll of Successive Actions.

title: Sleet
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon is in the field during Hail weather. All Pokemon that are not immune to Hail receive 2 damage rather than 1.

title: Slow Start
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon has remained dormant for thousand of years, its movements are heavy and slow, run away before it unleashes its full power.
rule

property | Effect | During the first 5 Rounds of a battle, this Pokemon will always go last in the initiative order. After those 5 Rounds are over, Increase 2 points to its Strength and Dexterity Attributes, and it will always go first in the initiative order. This effect resets if the Pokemon is called out of combat.

title: Slush Rush
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is used to run and hunt on icy terrain, moving swiftly through the snow during blizzards and ice storms.
rule
property | Effect | If Hail Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Dexterity Attribute of this Pokemon. The Pokemon is immune to damage from Hail Weather.

title: Sniper
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon will stealthily locate itself in an advantageous position to strike its foe's weak spots.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon lands a Critical Hit, it will get 3 Bonus Dice to the Damage Pool of its attack instead of the regular 2.

title: Snow Cloak
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's skin blends well with the surrounding snow and hail, you can barely see it.
rule
property | Effect | If Hail weather is in effect, Increase 1 Point to the Evasion of this Pokemon. The Pokemon is immune to damage from Hail weather.

title: Snow Warning
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is able to call a terrible hailstorm at will. Snow will cover the battlefield and sharp ice shards will come plummeting from the sky.
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Hail Weather. The effects end when the Pokemon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate the Pokemon with higher Will might keep the dominant weather)

title: Solar Power
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is capable of overcharging itself with energy from the sun, making it more powerful but also taking a toll on its body.
rule
property | Effect | While Sunny Weather is in effect, Increase 2 Points to this Pokemon's Special Attribute. If Sunny weather is in effect, this Pokemon will receive 1 damage at the end of the round.

title: Solid Rock
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's body is composed of extremely hard rock, protecting it from everything, even its own weaknesses.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon is hit by a move dealing Super-Effective Damage, reduce 1 Damage dealt to it.

title: Soul Heart
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is naturally caring and nurturing and if there's a threat to its loved ones, its soul will be made stronger out of love.
rule
property | Effect | If a foe faints because of an attack dealt by this Pokemon, Increase 1 Point to its Special Attribute. Up to 3 points can be increased this way.

title: Soundproof
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's body is structured to protect it from noises that might disturb its peace and focus. So it's not ignoring you, it just can't hear you.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon is immune to the damage and effects of all Sound-based moves.

title: Spectral Jaws
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon uses a move with the Keywords: Fang, Bite or Crunch, add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of that Move. These moves are all converted to Special.

title: Speed Boost
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon will start maneuvering at an accelerated rate, it will move as if it blinked from place to place.
rule
property | Effect | At the end of the Round, Increase 1 Point to this Pokemon's Dexterity Attribute. Up to 3 Points might be added this way.

title: Speed Swap
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | When this Pokemon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Trick Room. The effects end when the Pokemon leaves the battle.

title: Spirit Call
contents: subtitle |
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Ghost-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

title: Stakeout
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is constantly surveilling its environment, looking out for possible prey, attacking them when they are most vulnerable.
rule
property | Effect | Whenever a Foe Pokemon switches out, this Pokemon will inflict 1 additional Damage with its first successful attack to its replacement.

title: Stall
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is indecisive and always lets others act first before making its mind on what action to take.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon always goes last in the the initiative order.

title: Stalwart
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon naturally has a high sense of duty and loyalty, once you give it a task it will not stay until its quest is complete.
rule
property | Effect | Ignore any Moves or Abilities that would redirect this Pokemon's Moves into another target. (i.e. The Move “Follow Me”, the Ability “Lightining Rod” etc.)

title: Stamina
contents: subtitle | This pokemon cannot get tired. It regains its fortitude when it feels weak. Even when it barely eats or sleeps.
rule
property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon receives Damage in combat, increase 1 point to its Defense and Special Defense

title: Stance Change
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon can change forms and become a mighty shield or a powerful blade. It's attributes switch upon a change of stance.
rule

property | Effect | Only Aegislash may use this Ability. At the beginning of the round, choose a Form. While in Sword Stance it can only use Attack moves. While in Shield Stance, it can only use Support Moves. Adjust its Attributes according to the Rank and Limits it has for each Form.

title: Static
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's body is always ready to let off a jolt of static electricity at the slightest touch.
rule
property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze its foe.

title: Steadfast
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon becomes even more dependable when adversity strikes.
rule
property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon is affected by Flinch, Increase 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute.

title: Steam Engine
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon works as a steam furnace, with a bit of fire and water it can move anything at great speeds. It also loves to eat coal.
rule
property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon is hit with a Fire or Water-Type Move. Increase 3 Points to its Dexterity Atribute.

title: Steelworker
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is capable of molding and eating steel, giving shape and a sharper edge to whatever metal it touches.
rule
property | Effect | Steel-Type Attacks used by this Pokemon get 1 Extra Die to their Damage Pool.

title: Steely Spirit
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon has a balky behaviour most of the time. if it sets its mind to something it will see it done. Infuriating and inspiring at the same time.
rule
property | Effect | Steel-Type Attacks used by this Pokemon and Allies get 1 Extra Die to their Damage Pool.

title: Stench
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon can emit a smell so unpleasant it repels other people and Pokemon.
rule
property | Effect | Reduces the chance of random Wild Pokemon encounters. Whenever this Pokemon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, it Rolls 1 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

title: Sticky Hold
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's body is always oozing adhesive substances, if something gets glued, it will be very difficult to remove.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon's Held Item cannot be removed, stolen or swapped by Moves or Abilities.

title: Storm Drain
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon absorbs moisture and liquids like a sponge, then uses them to increase its power and last more time outside of water.
rule

property | Effect | If anyone uses a Water-Type move with a Single target, it will be redirected to this Pokemon; it is immune to damage from them. The first time this Pokemon is hit by a Water-Type move, Increase 1 Point to this Pokemon's Special.

title: Strong Jaw
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon's strong jaw gives it tremendous biting power. Its teeth can tear through almost anything.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon uses a move with the Keywords: Fang, Bite or Crunch, add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of that Move.

title: Sturdy
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's body is extremely resistant to damage, it can withstand almost anything.
rule

property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon would faint due to a Damaging move, it will remain at 1 HP instead. Status Conditions and Self inflicted damage will still cause it to faint. The Pokemon must rest for an hour before benefiting from Sturdy again.

title: Suction Cups
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's limbs contain suckers that allow it to stay rooted in place. It can stick to any kind of surface, even upside down.
rule
property | Effect | The Pokemon is immune to effects that force switches.

title: Super Luck
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon has an incredible good luck, good things happen to it regularly.
rule

property | Effect | Add “High Critical” to all the Attack Moves of this Pokemon. If a move already has the High Critical property, this Pokemon will only need 1 More Success on the Accuracy roll to land a Critical instead of 2.

title: Supercell
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | If New Moon and Rainy Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Special Attibute of this Pokemon.

title: Surge Surfer
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's magnetic field allows it to stand and surf on top of electric currents as if it were floating.
rule
property | Effect | If Electric Terrain is in effect, Increase 2 Points to this Pokemon's Dexterity Attribute.

title: Swarm
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon enters a hive mind state when its life is on the line, becoming more feral and aggressive.
rule
property | Effect | When this Pokemon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Bug-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

title: Sweet Veil
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's delicious aroma will wake the appetite of all Pokemon nearby.
rule
property | Effect | The Pokemon and its allies are immune to the Sleep status. Increase random encounters with Wild Pokemon.

title: Swift Swim
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon will move faster in water than on land, even a puddle covered roadway will allow it to use its full speed.
rule
property | Effect | If Rain Weather is in effect, Increase 2 Points to this Pokemon's Dexterity Attribute.

title: Symbiosis
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon enjoys forming a beneficial reletionship with any ally it teams up with.
rule
property | Effect | If an ally loses or spends its Held Item, this Pokemon will immediately give the one it's holding to the ally as a free action.

title: Synchronize
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon can share its mood, feelings and sensations with others, especially with those who caused it pain.
rule
property | Effect | If a foe inflicts a Status Condition to this Pokemon, the same condition is inflicted into the foe unless it is immune to the effect.

title: Tangled Feet
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon moves in a very strange and particular way when dizzy or confused, this usually works to its advantage.
rule
property | Effect | While this Pokemon is Confused, Add an extra -2 “Reduced Accuracy” to all the foe's Moves which target this Pokemon.

title: Tangling Hair
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's hair is thick and tough, it easily tangles anyone who comes close to it. Brush it twice a day to keep it silky and shiny.
rule
property | Effect | The first time a foe hits this Pokemon with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, reduce 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute.

title: Technician
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is meticulous and precise in tasks that everyone else would perform roughly and without care.
rule
property | Effect | Add 1 dice to the Damage pool of all Moves with Power 2 or less.

title: Telepathy
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon can communicate using telepathy. It can send messages to other minds but it cannot receive messages back.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon won't receive damage from moves performed by its allies.

title: Teravolt
contents: subtitle | There's a ball of blue lightning coming out of this Pokemon that prevents its foes from being out of reach, no matter what you do, it will zap you.
rule
