property | Effect | If a Move, Item or Ability would prevent this Pokemon from targeting a foe or inflicting an effect, ignore it. (e.g. A Pokemon with Immunity can be Poisoned, A Pokemon with Levitate can be hit by Ground moves).

title: Thick Fat
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's body has a thick layer of blubber that protects it against against harsh temperatures.
rule
property | Effect | Reduce by 1 the damage taken from Fire and Ice-Type moves.

title: Tinted Lens
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's goggle-like eyes can find the good side in every bad situation, even when there is none.
rule

property | Effect | If a foe has a resistance against an attack performed by this Pokemon, make that attack deal Regular Damage instead. If the foe has a double resistance, make the attack as if the foe had only one.

title: Torrent
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon builds up pressure to shoot water streams. When that pressure cannot be held in, it is released through uncontrollable torrents.
rule

property | Effect | When this Pokemon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Water-Type Moves, and they will get 1 Extra Die to their Damage Pool.

title: Tough Claws
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's claws are so sturdy, they can tear through almost anything.
rule
property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon uses a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, Add 1 Die to its damage pool.

title: Toxic Boost
contents: subtitle | The blood of this Pokemon boils and goes into a powerful rampage whenever it is afflicted by poison.
rule
property | Effect | If this Pokemon gets the Poison or Badly Poison Status, Increase 2 Point to its Strength Attribute.

title: Trace
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon mimics the special characteristics of the others, making them look as if they were its own.
rule

property | Effect | This Pokemon copies the ability of one random foe when it comes out. Effect ends if this Pokemon is removed from the battle. Some Abilities (Flower Gift, Illusion, Imposter, Stance Change, Wonder Guard etc.) Can't be copied.

title: Triage
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon feels the urgency to treat the injured; it is also very quick to stitch and make knots. A skill often used to instantly mend wounds.
rule
property | Effect | Add Pritority +1 to all Support moves of this Pokemon that Heal HP or cure Status Ailments.

title: Truant
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is extremely lazy, it won't make even the tiniest effort and often loafs off even in the heat of battle.
rule
property | Effect | Roll this Pokemon's Loyalty every other turn, and score at least 2 successes. If the roll fails this Pokemon refuses to act. If it is successful it may act normally.

title: Turboblaze
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon surrounds everything with a giant ball of swirling flames that prevents its foes from being out of reach, there is no escaping the heat.
rule

property | Effect | If a Move, Item or Ability would prevent this Pokemon from targeting a foe or inflicting an effect, ignore it. (e.g. A Pokemon with Immunity can be Poisoned, A Pokemon with Levitate can be hit by Ground moves).

title: Unaware
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is oblivious to many details in its surroundings, it will rarely take notice of things going on.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon ignores any of the opponent's Attribute increases or decreases. Both when attacking and taking damage.

title: Unburden
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is most comfortable when it is freed from having to carry stuff around. It loves to be able to move without restrictions.
rule
property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon loses or spends its held item and is no longer holding any, Increase 2 Points to its Dexterity Attribute.

title: Unleafed
contents: subtitle |
rule

property | Effect | When Mega evolving or on switch in. Increase the user's Strength, Defense, Special, Special Defense and Dexterity by 1. These boosts lasts for X + 1 turns where X is the number of fainted Pokemon in this Pokemon's team.

title: Unnerve
contents: subtitle | It may be its powerful gaze or its menacing presence, but others near this Pokemon become really nervous to the point where they lose their appetite.
rule
property | Effect | Opponents may not consume their held berry while this Pokemon is in the field.

title: Vampiric
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | When using a contact move, the user restores hp equal to a quarter of the damage dealt, rounded down.

title: Vaporization
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | All Water Type moves including Support moves will fail. Water Type Pokemon take 1 damage per round.

title: Venomous
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | The Pokemon will inflict Poison+ in place of regular Poison.

title: Victory Star
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's presence is an incredible boost for morale. Those who get its favor will be guided to victory.
rule
property | Effect | This Pokemon's and All its allies damaging moves gain “Never Miss” while this Pokemon is on the field. This Ability can't be switched or swapped.

title: Vital Spirit
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is incredibly active and energetic. It needs constant activity and exercise or else it will act destructive. It never sleeps.
rule
property | Effect | The Pokemon is immune to the Sleep status.

title: Volt Absorb
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's body is practically a battery that is always happy to become charged to full capacity.
rule
property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon is hit by an Electric-Type Move, you may Heal 1 HP instead of receiving damage. Electric-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokemon.

title: Wandering Spirit
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is a wandering ghost with a haunted expression on its face. It won't heed your call and might get lost floating aimlessly. Get to a medium to heal it.
rule

property | Effect | If this Pokemon hits a Foe with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, it switches its Ability with the Foe's. Some Abilities (Flower Gift, Illusion, Imposter, Stance Change, Wonder Guard etc.) can't be switched at Storyteller's discretion.

title: Water Absorb
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon's body is mostly made of water, it stores water inside itself and uses it for nourishment.
rule
property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon is hit by a Water-Type Move, you may Heal 1 HP instead of receiving damage. Water-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokemon.

title: Water Bubble
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is shielded by water bubble. Stragely, the bubble has clear water inside instead of air.
rule
property | Effect | Fire-Type Moves deal 1 less damage to this Pokemon. This Pokemon is immune to Burn 1 and Burn 2 Status. Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of this Pokemon's Water-Type Moves.

title: Water Compaction
contents: subtitle | The body of the Pokemon can absorb water at an astounding rate, its body hardens as it quickly dries.
rule
property | Effect | The fist time this Pokemon is hit by a Water-Type Move, Increase its Defense by 2 instead of receiving damage. Water-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokemon.

title: Water Veil
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon is always wet and producing water to keep itself moist. Thanks to this, the Pokemon can stay away from a body of water for a long time.
rule
property | Effect | The Pokemon is immune to any of the Burn status.

title: Weak Armor
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's protective outer layers can come off, allowing it to move freely and be more agile.
rule
property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon is hit by any Physical Attack, Increase 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute and Reduce 1 Point to its Defense.

title: White Smoke
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon is constantly releasing fumes of white smoke making it difficult to be seen. It uses the smoke to conceal itself.
rule
property | Effect | Foes cannot reduce the Attributes of this Pokemon. However, it can still lower its own Attributes.

title: Wimp Out
contents: subtitle | The Pokemon goes into a lot of stress whenever its exoskeleton is weakened, it can escape from any situation out of sheer cowardice.
rule

property | Effect | Whenever this Pokemon reaches half of its total HP, it will switch out to its pokeball, sending an Ally to take its place. If there is no Ally, the battle may end. This Ability's effect is not affected by Block.

title: Wind Force
contents: subtitle |
rule
property | Effect | The first time this Pokemon is hit by a Flying-Type move, add 1 Extra Die to the Damage Pool of Fire-type Moves this Pokemon uses until the end of the scene.

title: Wonder Guard
contents: subtitle | This Pokemon's body is protected by an incredible otherworldly aura. Most things get through as if nothing was there.
rule

property | Effect | This Pokemon only receives damage from Status Conditions, and from Moves that deal Super Effective damage against it. This Pokemon is immune to damage from other sources like weather conditions and entry hazards.

title: Wonder Skin
contents: subtitle | The skin of this Pokemon is covered by a thin protective veil that allows it to weaken dangerous hazards.
rule
property | Effect | Reduce up to 2 Chance Dice from foes against this Pokemon. (Example: The move Ember has 1 Chance Dice to Burn the foe, against this Pokemon it has zero Chance Dice).

title: Zen Mode
contents: subtitle | Under extreme stress, this Pokemon will unlock its hidden psychic abilities through the power of meditation, it will go back to normal the next day.
rule

property | Effect | Only Darmanitan may use this Ability. When at half or less of its HP, change to Zen Mode Form at the end of the Round. Use its Zen Mode Form from then on. Adjust its Attributes according to the Rank and Limits it has for each Form.
